name: The European Association for Electromobility
goal:
AVERE – founded in 1978 - is a European network of members including Users, NGO’s, Associations, Interest groups, Public Institutions, Research & Development entities, Vehicle and Equipment Manufacturers and other relevant Companies.

AVERE shares knowledge on policy, products and inspiration across businesses and borders. Electric vehicles may be the most promising and important climate solution as well as the solution for clean and more quiet cities.

The main activities to achieve these objectives are related to dissemination, networking, monitoring, participation in European and multilateral projects, lobbying, research and development, among other. In public policy, AVERE presents the electric drive industry’s and R&D bodies’ concerns to the European Commission.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
